thread.title: Comment on So Derek Willis’ finger is pretty disgusting by Houndstooth
thread.title_full: Comment on So Derek Willis’ finger is pretty disgusting by Houndstooth

author: Houndstooth
title: Comment on So Derek Willis’ finger is pretty disgusting by Houndstooth
text:
Posted in Basketball , Main | 3 Responses 
Derek Willis is out a couple of weeks with an injured finger on his left hand. He said today doctors expect him to be back in action in about 10 days . 
Willis would play now, if he could, but the injury required three stitches, and he isn’t cleared to practice until they’re removed. He tried to participate in UK’s Pro Day, the day after his middle finger bone dislocated through the skin . 
“There was blood on the floor,” said Calipari, when discussing the injury earlier today. “I wanted to go throw up.” 
Willis said he was worried it was fractured when he first injured it. Then he realized “it was just a bone sticking out,” so he snapped it back into place . 
I have no problem admitting I would’ve passed out and then asked for a redshirt season. Article written by Drew Franklin I can recite every line from Forrest Gump, blindfolded. Follow me on Twitter: @DrewFranklinKSR 3 responses to “So Derek Willis’ finger is pretty disgusting” inside info2 October 14, 2015 at 7:51 pm | Permalink | Reply 
This is all Cal’s fault. This will probably cost us a game or two this year. Dr. D. Mento October 14, 2015 at 7:58 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Looks like he just completed a prostate examination. Houndstooth October 14, 2015 at 11:33 pm | Permalink | Reply 
So Cal had to surgically remove the girlfriend from Willis’ finger to get him to practice more. Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
